trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of locked configuration objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含鎖定的組態物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: In a configuration file, a configuration section contains both attributes and elements.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔中的組態區段包含屬性和項目。

trans-unit.source: A ConfigurationLockCollection collection exists for the locked attributes of a configuration section, and is accessed through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> class.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationLockCollection 集合的組態區段中，鎖定屬性存在，而且存取透過<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>類別。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another ConfigurationLockCollection collection exists for the locked elements of a configuration section, and is accessed through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockElements%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 另一個 ConfigurationLockCollection 集合的組態區段中，鎖定的項目存在，而且存取透過<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockElements%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>類別。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockElements%2A>

trans-unit.source: Locks a configuration object by adding it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定組態物件將它加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Adding a configuration object to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection> collection specifies that the configuration object is locked and cannot be modified until it has been removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將組態物件加入<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection>集合指定組態物件已鎖定且無法修改，直到它已從集合移除。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 組態物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the name does not match an existing configuration object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 發生時 name 不符合集合中現有的組態物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of configuration objects contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中包含的組態物件的清單。

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited string that lists the lock configuration objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 以逗號分隔的字串，其中列出集合中的鎖定組態物件。

trans-unit.source: Clears all configuration objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合中的所有組態物件。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether a specific configuration object is locked.
trans-unit.target: 確認是否已鎖定特定的組態物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration object to verify.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證組態物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> contains the specified configuration object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>包含指定的組態物件，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 複製整個<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>相容的一維集合<xref:System.Array>，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是從複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>必須有以零為起始的索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of locked configuration objects contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中包含的鎖定的組態物件數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of locked configuration objects contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中包含的鎖定的組態物件數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object, which is used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>物件，用來逐一查看這個<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the collection of locked objects has parent elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定鎖定物件的集合是否具有父項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection has parent elements; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合中有父項目，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the collection has been modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否已修改集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection has been modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合已修改，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether a specific configuration object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 會驗證特定的組態物件是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration object to verify.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證組態物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified configuration object in the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的組態物件存放至<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合是唯讀，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified configuration object is not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的組態物件不在集合中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否要同步處理集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合是已同步處理，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes a configuration object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除的組態物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 組態物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the name does not match an existing configuration object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 發生時 name 不符合集合中現有的組態物件。

trans-unit.source: Locks a set of configuration objects based on the supplied list.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定一組提供的清單為基礎的組態物件。

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited string.
trans-unit.target: 以逗號分隔的字串。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item in the attributeList parameter is not a valid lockable configuration attribute.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目時，就會發生 attributeList 參數不是有效的可鎖定型組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object used to synchronize access to this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來同步存取這個物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: An object used to synchronize access to this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用來同步存取這個物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 複製整個<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>相容的一維集合<xref:System.Array>，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是從複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationLockCollection"></xref>集合。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>必須有以零為起始的索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。
